perturbation.original_text: Operator shall comply, in the performance of its duties and responsibilities hereunder, in all respects with all Environmental Laws and all Environmental Permits.
perturbation.changed_text: Operator shall endeavor to comply, in the performance of its duties and responsibilities hereunder, with all Environmental Laws and Environmental Permits.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'shall comply' to 'shall endeavor to comply' weakens the obligation. This implies that Operator only needs to make an effort, potentially not achieving full compliance with environmental regulations. This ambiguity introduces a legal contradiction.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Federal Clean Water Act, Resource Conservation and Recovery Act (RCRA)

perturbation.original_text: Notwithstanding the foregoing, all personnel provided by Operator to operate and maintain the Rail Facility shall have the requisite background, training and skill necessary to operate such a facility in accordance with all current industry standards and any and all applicable state and federal Laws, Environmental Laws, and Environmental Permits.
perturbation.changed_text: Notwithstanding the foregoing, all personnel provided by Operator to operate and maintain the Rail Facility should generally have some background, training, and skill applicable to operating such a facility.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'shall have the requisite background, training and skill necessary to operate such a facility in accordance with all current industry standards and any and all applicable state and federal Laws, Environmental Laws, and Environmental Permits' with 'should generally have some background, training, and skill applicable to operating such a facility' creates a vague and weaker obligation. This does not ensure compliance with industry safety standards or environmental regulations.

perturbation.original_text: Operator shall be responsible for preparing and submitting all regulatory filings pertaining to the Rail Facility required by any Governmental Authority.
perturbation.changed_text: Operator will attempt to prepare and submit regulatory filings pertaining to the Rail Facility as it deems necessary.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'shall be responsible' to 'will attempt to' and replacing 'required by any Governmental Authority' with 'as it deems necessary' weakens the obligation. This allows Operator to decide which filings are necessary, potentially omitting required submissions and violating regulations.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Louisiana Department of Environmental Quality regulations
